name: David Ramirez
text: I feel like a lot of ATLA was better than Korra.    Korra was a little uneven. Some really good parts, some meh parts, and there's one arc with elements super-inspired (very close to copying) by bits from Mononoke Hime.

source_obj.text: I feel like a lot of ATLA was better than Korra.    Korra was a little uneven. Some really good parts, some meh parts, and there's one arc with elements super-inspired (very close to copying) by bits from Mononoke Hime.
